original: Block, Carl Elis Daniel, biskop, Göteborg, f. 12/2/74 i Öxnevalla, Älvsb. 1., av kontr :prost Herder B. o. Charlotte Cullberg. G. 06 m. Elisabet Bolin. Barn: Kerstin f. 07, d. 08, Märta 08, fil. mag., g. m. kommin. Äke Janson, Sävedalen, Erik 10, förste und :läk. v. Karoil. sjukh., Sthlm, Bertil 12, teol. dr, fil. kand., lektor, Visby, Anna-Lisa 15, handarb :lär :a, g. m. banktj :man Rudolf Dahlqvist, Varberg. — Fil. kand. 95, teor. teol. ex. 96, prakt. teol. ex. 97, prästv. 98, disp :prov 10, teol. hed:dr 35. Tredje pred. i Borås 06, kommin. i Vasa förs. i Gbg 08, kyrkoh. i Mölndal 15-29, e. o. hovpred. 19, biskop i Gbgs stift sed. 29. Ordf. i styr. f, Gbgs diakonissanst., Allm. hjälpfören., Gbgs bibelsällsk., Gustaf Adolfs-stift. m. m. Skr.: Kristologien i hegelsk bearb. (10), Herdabrev (29), ett fiert. upps. o. föredr. GV:sJmt, KmstkNO.
translated: Block, Carl Elis Daniel, bishop, Gothenburg, b. February 12th, 1874 in Oxnevalla, Älvsborgs län, son of Kontraktsprost Herder B. and Charlotte Cullberg. Married in 1906 to Elisabet Bolin. Children: Kerstin b. 1907, d. 1908, Märta b. 1908, Fil. Mag., married to Kommin. Äke Janson, Sävedalen, Erik b. 1910, first assistant physician at Karolinska Hospital in Stockholm, Bertil b. 1912, Dr. Theol., Fil. Kand., Lecturer in Visby, Anna-Lisa b. 1915, handicraft teacher, married to bank official Rudolf Dahlqvist, Varberg. Completed a degree in Fil. Kand. in 1895, Theoretical Theology exam in 1896, Practical Theology exam in 1897, Ordained in 1898, Disputation in 1910, Honorary Doctorate in Theology in 1935. Third preacher in Borås in 1906, pastor in Vasa parish in Gothenburg in 1908, vicar in Mölndal 1915-1929, Extra Court Chaplain in 1919, Bishop of Gothenburg since 1929. Chairman of the boards for Gothenburg Deaconess Institute, Public Assistance Association, Gothenburg Bible Society, Gustaf Adolf Foundation and more. Writings include: The Christology in Hegelian adaptation (1910), Pastoral Letter (1929), several essays and lectures. Awarded the Grand Cross of the Order of Vasa and Knight 1st Class of the Order of the Polar Star.

hasOccupation.name: First assistant physician at Karolinska Hospital in Stockholm
